query:
WITH RECURSIVE folder_tree AS (
            SELECT id FROM folders WHERE id = ?
            UNION ALL
            SELECT f.id FROM folders f
            INNER JOIN folder_tree ft ON f.parent_id = ft.id
        )
        SELECT
            t.id,
            t.content_length,
            t.content
        FROM texts t
        WHERE t.folder_id IN (SELECT id FROM folder_tree)
